payon,166,221,3	script	CBT Claim Event	833,{
setarray .@CBTCostume,2000000,2000001,2000002,2000003,2000004,2000006,2000007,2000008,2000009,2000010,2000011,2000019,2000022,2000026,2000028,2000029,2000041,2000044,2000046,2000049,2000050,2000053,2000054,2000058,2000063,2000064,2000066,2000067,2000068,2000069,2000070,2000071,2000072,2000073,2000074,2000077,2000078,2000079,2000080,2000081,2000082,2000083,2000084,2000086,2000087,2000088,2000090,2000091,2000092,2000093,2000094,2000095,2000096,2000097,2000098,2000099,2000100,2000101,2000102,2000103,2000104,2000105,2000106,2000107,2000108,2000109,2000110,2000111,2000113,2000114,2000115,2000116,2000117,2000118,2000119,2000120,2000121,2000122,2000124,2000125,2000126,2000128,2000129,2000130,2000131,2000132,2000133,2000134,2000135,2000136,2000137,2000138,2000139,2000140,2000141,2000142,2000143,2000145,2000147,2000148,2000149,2000150,2000151,2000153,2000154,2000155,2000156,2000157,2000158,2000160,2000161,2000162,2000163,2000164,2000166,2000167,2000168,2000169,2000171,2000172,2000173,2000174,2000175,2000176,2000177,2000179,2000181,2000183,2000184,2000185,2000186,2000188,2000189,2000190,2000191,2000192,2000193,2000194,2000195,2000196,2000197,2000198,2000199,2000200,2000201,2000202,2000203,2000204,2000205,2000206,2000207,2000211,2000212,2000214,2000216,2000217,2000218,2000219,2000220,2000221,2000222,2000223,2000224,2000225,2000226,2000227,2000228,2000229,2000230,2000231,2000232,2000233,2000234,2000235,2000236,2000237,2000238,2000239,2000240,2000241,2000242,2000243,2000244,2000245,2000246,2000247,2000248,2000249,2000250,2000252,2000253,2000255,2000256,2000257,2000258,2000259,2000260,2000261,2000264,2000265,2000266,2000267,2000268,2000269,2000270,2000271,2000273,2000275,2000277,2000278,2000280,2000282,2000283,2000284,2000285,2000286,2000288,2000290,2000291,2000292,2000293,2000295,2000296,2000297,2000299,2000300,2000301,2000302,2000304,2000305,2000306,2000307,2000309,2000310,2000311,2000312,2000313;
setarray .@whitesub,2000000,2000001,2000338,2000070,2000195,2000232,2000256;
setarray .@redsub,2000000,2000230,2000249,2000068;
setarray .@servantmvp,2000000,2000097;
setarray .@crownpvp,2000000,2000087,2000094,2000286;

if (!checkweight(512,10)) {
mes "Please Check ur Weight";
end;
}

.@accountid = getcharid(3);

if( #givecbt || #white || #red || #servant || #crown ) {
mes "Hadiah sudah kamu claim !";
close;
}

if(!#givecbt && inarray(.@CBTCostume,.@accountid) != -1){
		getinventorylist;
		if ( @inventorylist_count >= 94 ) {
		mes "Please check your inventory Limit";
		end;
		}
		getitembound 20507,1,Bound_Account;
		getitembound 19832,1,Bound_Account;
		#givecbt = true;
	}
if(!#white && inarray(.@whitesub,.@accountid) != -1){
	getitem 20132,1;
	if (.@accountid == 2000070){
	getitem 20132,1;
	}
	#white = true;
}
if(!#red && inarray(.@redsub,.@accountid) != -1){
	getitem 20407,1;
	#red = true;
}
if(!#servant && inarray(.@servantmvp,.@accountid) != -1){
	getitem 20430,1;
	#servant = true;
}
if(!#crown && inarray(.@crownpvp,.@accountid) != -1){
	getitem 19988,1;
	#crown = true;
}
mes "Terimakasih sudah bermain di CBT~ Happy RO~.";
end;
}
